title: RANKED NEEDS FIXING FOR THE LOVE OF GOD
body: HONESTLY I CANT MOVE UP OR DOWN IN RANKED DUE TO THE FACT OF SO MANY AFKERS. HONESTLY IF AN AFKER HAPPENS RIOT HALVE THE BLOODY LP LOSS ITS REDICULOUS.

replies.body: They need to do something, honestly I like the idea behind loss prevention that they have going on but it just doesn't apply to anything beyond server errors as far as I can tell. They should probably broaden it's range into afk's and possibly intentional feeders if they get a system that is clever enough to detect it.
